sentences.en: " Rolled round in earth's diurnal course, With rocks , and stones, and trees. "
sentences.cn: 每天与岩石和树木一起, 随地球循环旋转.

sentences.en: Analysis of Hawaiian diurnal rainfall patterns.
sentences.cn: 夏威夷日降雨分布的分析.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Diurnal BP change is abnormal in the aged cerebral infarction patients with hypertension during convalescence.
sentences.cn: 结论: 有高血压史的脑梗塞患者恢复期的血压昼夜变化仍有异常.

sentences.en: Conclusions Clinical diversity and diurnal fluctuation are the characteristics of DRD.
sentences.cn: 结论　DRD患者具有症状多样及日间波动的特点.

sentences.en: Diurnal variation of photosynthesis of of F. pashannica seedlings was single peak type.
sentences.cn: 巴山水青冈幼苗的光合日变化为单峰型曲线.

sentences.en: Diurnal variations of surface ocean pCO 2 and sea - air CO 2 flux evaluated using remotely sensed data.
sentences.cn: 利用遥感资料评价海面pCO2和海 - 气CO2通量的日变化.

sentences.en: For example, small diurnal rodents eat berries, nuts, leaves, fruit, seeds, and insects.
sentences.cn: 例如, 昼出的小啮齿动物采食浆果 、 坚果 、 树叶 、 果实 、 种子以及昆虫.

sentences.en: Instead of seasonal, they ( land and sea breezes ) are diurnal.
sentences.cn: 海陆风不是季节变化的, 而是昼夜变化的.

sentences.en: Over water the diurnal change in refraction is likely to be small.
sentences.cn: 在水面上,折光的周日变化可能是很小的.

sentences.en: The characteristic of diurnal hourly wind speed variation has been thoroughly analyzed.
sentences.cn: 该文简述了短期风速预测的价值和方法,分析了小时风速的日变化特点.

sentences.en: The curve of diurnal variation of leaf photosynthesis showed two single peak.
sentences.cn: 随着灌水量的降低,其净光合速率日变化呈双峰曲线.

sentences.en: the diurnal rotation of the earth
The diurnal springs correspond to the semidiurnal neaps and vice versa.
sentences.cn: 全日潮大潮对应于半日潮小潮,反之亦然.

sentences.en: The Earth moved slowly in its diurnal course.
sentences.cn: 地球照常按自己每日的规律慢慢地转动着.

sentences.en: The purpose of reoccupations is to keep track of diurnal variations in the earth's field.
sentences.cn: 重测的目的在于记录地磁场的日变.

words.tran_cn: [动]白天的；[天]每日的，一日间的

phrases.tran_cn: 日变化；日变程；日际变化；昼夜变化

trans.tran_cn: 白天的，每日的，占用一天的，只活一天的
